org.spongepowered.api.entity

Interface EntityState

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Aerial, Ageable, Agent, Ambient, Animal, Aquatic, ArmorStand, Arrow, Bat, Blaze, Boat, Boss, CaveSpider, Chicken, ComplexLiving, ComplexLivingPart, Cow, Creeper, DamagingProjectile, Egg, EnderCrystal, EnderDragon, EnderDragonPart, Enderman, Endermite, EnderPearl, Entity, EntitySnapshot, ExperienceOrb, Explosive, EyeOfEnder, FallingBlock, Fireball, Firework, FishHook, FusedExplosive, Ghast, Giant, Golem, Guardian, Hanging, Horse, Human, IgnitableExplosive, IronGolem, Item, ItemFrame, LargeFireball, LeashHitch, Lightning, Living, MagmaCube, Minecart, MinecartChest, MinecartCommandBlock, MinecartContainer, MinecartFurnace, MinecartHopper, MinecartMobSpawner, MinecartRideable, MinecartTNT, Monster, Mooshroom, Ocelot, Painting, Pig, Player, PrimedTNT, Projectile, Rabbit, Sheep, Silverfish, Sittable, Skeleton, Slime, SmallFireball, Snowball, SnowGolem, Spider, Squid, Tameable, ThrownExpBottle, ThrownPotion, Villager, WeatherEffect, Witch, Wither, WitherSkull, Wolf, Zombie, ZombiePigman

    public interface EntityState
    Represents an entity with type and data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntitySnapshot getSnapshot()
      Get a snapshot of this entity at the current point in time.
      EntityType getType()
      Get the type of entity.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        EntityType getType()
        Get the type of entity.
        Returns:
        The type of entity

      • getSnapshot

        EntitySnapshot getSnapshot()
        Get a snapshot of this entity at the current point in time.

        An entity is disconnected from the Extent that it was taken from so changes to the original entity do not affect the snapshot.

        Returns:
        A snapshot
